name: Egyptian Captivity
short: Israel enslaved in Egypt until the Exodus under Moses.

name: Assyrian Captivity
short: Northern Kingdom (Israel) exiled by Assyria; 8th century BCE.

name: Babylonian Captivity
short: Southern Kingdom (Judah) exiled to Babylon; temple destroyed.

name: Persian Return
short: Return and rebuilding of the Temple under Persian rule.

name: Greek Domination
short: Hellenistic control following Alexander; cultural oppression.

name: Roman Captivity & Dispersion
short: Roman rule; Temple destroyed 70 AD; Bar Kokhba revolt 135 AD.

name: Arab/Islamic Captivity (SSST)
short: Sub-Saharan slave trade under Islamic powers; 7th–19th centuries.

name: European/American Captivity (TAST)
short: Trans-Atlantic slave trade; forced dispersion to the Americas.

name: Colonial & Modern Captivity
short: Colonial exploitation, systemic oppression, and modern diaspora.
